citations.narrative:
There is a section of the sheet metal on one side of the shelter for the 2 large pigs that has pulled away from the wall.
Approximately 50 % of the sheet metal is bowed outward. This is an area that may cause injury to the pigs. The facility
must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. CORRECT BY : 11/5/2020
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees .
Additional Inspectors:
Gervais Wiggins, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There is a section of the sheet metal on one side of the shelter for the 2 large pigs that has pulled away from the wall. 
Approximately 50 % of the sheet metal is bowed outward. This is an area that may cause injury to the pigs. The facility 
must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. CORRECT BY : 11/5/2020 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees . 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Gervais Wiggins, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
